decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The door(s) of the garage hereby permitted shall not open over or encroach in any way on the highway, or shared accessway.

Condition : 3 - Before the building/extension hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in the units elevation of the shall be glazed with obscured glass and fixed shut and shall be maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 4 - A 2 metre high close boarded fence shall be constructed and maintained along the boundaries with the adjoining residential properties to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority, prior to the occupation of the dwelling units hereby permitted.
Condition : 5 - All windows to the flats hereby approved shall be double glazed.
description: ERECTION OF 8  ONE BEDROOM FLATS IN TWO  TWO STOREY BLOCKS WITH 8 CAR PARKING SPACES..
